body: @aaroey I was able to use `linkshared=1` a shared library for the unit tests (i.e., `ngraph_tf_tests`) but for the TF python module (i.e., `pywrap_tensorflow_internal`) I don't know how to link it. If you can provide some help that I can try that as well.
body_html: @aaroey I was able to use linkshared=1 a shared library for the unit tests (i.e., ngraph_tf_tests) but for the TF python module (i.e., pywrap_tensorflow_internal) I don't know how to link it. If you can provide some help that I can try that as well.
body_text: @aaroey I was able to use linkshared=1 a shared library for the unit tests (i.e., ngraph_tf_tests) but for the TF python module (i.e., pywrap_tensorflow_internal) I don't know how to link it. If you can provide some help that I can try that as well.
